title: For You, I Will
description: From best selling romance author, Kristen Hope Mazzola, comes a heart-warming but quirky romantic comedy standalone that will leave you breathless and on the edge of your seat! We never planned to have children.I'm a recruiter for the NY Otters, my wife is a sports journalist. With our traveling schedules we thought all we had left to give was to each other.But when a ten year old boy is dropped at our doorstep there's no take-backs.I won't ever give him up.He's everything I never knew I needed.But can she handle turning a we into three?
author: Kristen Hope Mazzola
